name: swagger
description: The Swagger command-line. Provides Swagger utilities and project lifecycle support.
author: Scott Ganyo <sganyo@apigee.com>

scripts.test: mocha -u exports -R spec test/config.js test/util test/commands test/commands/project test/project-skeletons
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/config.js test/util test/commands test/commands/project test/project-skeletons
